enum poptmx::Kind

Type of the element in the table of the known options.

Enumerator:

Option.

ARGUMENT 

Argument.

NOTE 

Note.

MAN 

Manual page.

Post-parse processing function.

Definition at line 1687 of file poptmx.cpp.

template<class BClass >
OptionTable & poptmx::OptionTable::add ( Kind  _kind,
BClass *  _val,
const char  _char_name,
const std::string &  _long_name,
const std::string &  _short_desc,
const std::string &  _long_desc,
const std::string &  _dflt = "" 
) [inline, inherited]

Simplified interface to add the option into the table.

The interface to add the option into the table which argument's type has defined "bool _conversion ( BClass * , const std::string & )" and "std::string type_desc (BClass*)" functions.

Parameters:
_kindKind of entry to add. In this context can be ::OPTION.
_valOption::val
_char_nameOption::char_name
_long_nameOption::long_name
_short_descOption::short_desc
_long_descOption::long_desc

Definition at line 478 of file poptmx.h.

References poptmx::OptionTable::add(), OPTION, throw_error(), and type_desc().

const std::string &  _short_desc,
const std::string &  _long_desc,
const std::string &  _dflt = "" 
) [inline, inherited]

Simplified interface to add the argument into the table.

The interface to add into the table the argument which type has defined "bool _conversion ( BClass * , const std::string & )" and "std::string type_desc (BClass*)" functions.

Parameters:
_kindKind of entry to add. In this context can be ::ARGUMENT.
_valOption::val
_long_nameOption::long_name
_short_descOption::short_desc
_long_descOption::long_desc

template<class BClass >
OptionTable & poptmx::OptionTable::add ( Kind  _kind,
std::vector< BClass > *  _val,
const std::string &  _long_name,
const std::string &  _short_desc,
const std::string &  _long_desc,
const std::string &  _dflt = "" 
) [inline, inherited]

Simplified interface to add multiple-appearing argument into the table.

The interface to add the multi-acceptable argument into the table. The argument's type must have defined "bool _conversion ( BClass * , const std::string & )" and "std::string type_desc (BClass*)" functions.

Parameters:
_kindKind of entry to add. In this context can be ::ARGUMENT
_valOption::val
_long_nameOption::long_name
_short_descOption::short_desc
_long_descOption::long_desc

Definition at line 564 of file poptmx.h.

OptionTable & poptmx::OptionTable::add ( Kind  _kind,
std::vector< BClass > *  _val,
const char  _char_name,
const std::string &  _long_name,
const std::string &  _short_desc,
const std::string &  _long_desc,
const std::string &  _dflt = "" 
) [inline, inherited]

Simplified interface to add multiple-appearing option into the table.

The interface to add the multi-acceptable option into the table. The option's argument's type has defined "bool _conversion ( BClass * , const std::string & )" and "std::string type_desc (BClass*)" functions.

Parameters:
_kindKind of entry to add. In this context can be ::OPTION
_valOption::val
_char_nameOption::char_name
_long_nameOption::long_name
_short_descOption::short_desc
_long_descOption::long_desc

template<class BClass >
int poptmx::arr_conversion ( void *  _val,
const std::string &  in 
) [inline]

The layer between the real type-overloaded function which parses the string into value and the function which first converts the string into a temp value and then inserts it into the array of values. Needed here to be inserted into the Option entry Option::convert (of type bool (*)(void*, const std::string &) ).

Parameters:
_valThe array to accept the newly parsed value from the "in" string.
inThe string to be parsed into the value.
Returns:
true if the conversion is successful and false if failed.

Definition at line 522 of file poptmx.h.

template<class BClass >
int poptmx::conversion ( void *  _val,
const std::string &  in 
) [inline]

The layer between the real type-overloaded function which parses the string into value and the function which can be inserted into the Option entry as Option::convert (of type bool (*)(void*, const std::string &) )

Parameters:
_valThe value to be updated when parsing the "in" string.
inThe string to be parsed into the _val.
Returns:
true if the conversion is successful and false if failed.
